original_text: Now as the king of Israel was passing by on the wall, a woman cried out to him, saying, “Help, my lord, O king!”
korean_text: 이스라엘 왕이 성 위로 지나갈 때에 한 여인이 외쳐 이르되 나의 주 왕이여 도우소서

sentences.original_text: Now as the king of Israel was passing by on the wall
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 이스라엘 왕이 성벽 위를 지나가는데,

sentences.original_text: a woman cried out to him
